component.name: TrackDisplay
component.script:
function init() m.top.layoutDirection="vert" m.topitemSpacings="[15]" end function
function updateTracks() cur_track = m.top.findNode("cur_track") cur_track.artist = m.metadataTask.tracks[0].artist cur_track.album = m.metadataTask.tracks[0].album cur_track.title = m.metadataTask.tracks[0].song comment = m.top.findNode("comment") comment.text = m.metadataTask.tracks[0].comment print "comment" print m.metadataTask.tracks[0].comment
prev_track = m.top.findNode("prev_track") prev_track.artist = m.metadataTask.tracks[1].artist prev_track.album = m.metadataTask.tracks[1].album prev_track.title = m.metadataTask.tracks[1].song
prev_prev_track = m.top.findNode("prev_prev_track") prev_prev_track.artist = m.metadataTask.tracks[2].artist prev_prev_track.album = m.metadataTask.tracks[2].album prev_prev_track.title = m.metadataTask.tracks[2].song prev_prev_track = m.top.findNode("prev_prev_track") end function
